byline.contributor: Mary M. Chapman and Amy Haimerl contributed reporting.

abstract: Residents of Detroit are engaged in multi-layered conversation about city's recovery from bankruptcy, in light of fact that downtown is undeniably booming even as many neighborhoods continue to struggle.

headline.print_headline: In Detroit’s Recovery, Downtown Roars and Neighborhoods Sputter
headline.main: In Detroit’s 2-Speed Recovery, Downtown Roars and Neighborhoods Sputter

snippet: Questions over what defines progress for the city and who is benefiting most have set in motion a layered conversation about development, equity, race and class....
lead_paragraph: Questions over what defines progress for the city and who is benefiting most have set in motion a layered conversation about development, equity, race and class.
